instructions.title: There's been a murder!
instructions.body:
Interrogate the witnesses
to find the killer!

recap1.title: There's been a murder!
recap1.body:
Grab the knife and
find the killer!

recap2.title: Interrogation complete!
recap2.body:
Press SPACE in front of the
killer to stab them

messages.title: Tankman
messages.body:
He looked like a skinny
little @#*$ing nerd.

messages.title: Pico
messages.body:
It's always the punks with
the guns... er knife.

messages.title: Orange Knight
messages.body:
I slash evil all day, I don't
bother looking at evidence.

messages.title: Strawberry clock
messages.body:
The grey one had it coming,
the portal is mine!

messages.title: Alien hominid
messages.body:
The guys in suits came
in fast. Who even had
time with the body?

messages.title: P-bot
messages.body:
Meatbag on meatbag
violence, what a shame.

messages.title: Dad
messages.body:
I know what you're
thinking, but they were
killed with a knife.

messages.title: Salad Fingers
messages.body:
Hubert Cumberdale,
you've got such a
nice pink hat now.

messages.title: Blockhead
messages.body:
the man in my head said
he saw the killer, he
wasn't yellow at all!

accusation.title: Interrogation complete
accusation.body:
The murderer is still
around, grab the murder
weapon and strike back!

stab.title: You got the knife!
stab.body:
Press SPACE in front of the
killer to stab them

victory.title: Congratulations!
victory.body:
Brandy was the killer
all along!
You stabbed his face!
